channel.title: Blog and reference
channel.description: Recent content on Blog and reference

item.title: Hugo Error Error Building Site Failed to Unmarshal YAML Yaml Did Not Find Expected Key
item.description: Problem Did this: hugo server --theme cupper-hugo-theme Got this: WARN 2020/01/28 18:10:15 Module "cupper-hugo-theme" is not compatible with this Hugo version; run "hugo mod graph" for more information. Building sites ï¿½ Total in 4620 ms Error: Error building site: "C:\matt\website\content\blog\WARN found no layout file for HTML for page.md:2:1": failed to unmarshal YAML: yaml: did not find expected key Solution The yaml bit loked like this. --- title: "Hugo error - WARN 2020/01/28 15:49:09 found no layout file for "HTML" for "section": You should create a template file which matches Hugo Layouts Lookup Rules for this combination.

item.title: About
item.description: This website was created by me, Matt Penny. It’s got, or will have, the following bits: blog - stuff I’ve found worth documenting in a blog format over the years quickreference - my crib notes for doing stuff…beaten into submission and into markdown format sketchnotes - the notes I’ve taken at presentations etc Be careful with any of the technical stuff here, especially the quick reference.

item.title: Yet Another Getting Started With Hugo Post
item.description: Install hugo PS C:\matt> choco install hugo -confirm Output: Chocolatey v0.10.15 [Pending] Removing incomplete install for 'hugo' Installing the following packages: hugo By installing you accept licenses for the packages. hugo v0.62.1 [Approved] hugo package files install completed. Performing other installation steps. Downloading hugo 64 bit from 'https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.62.1/hugo_0.62.1_Windows-64bit.zip' Progress: 0% - Saving 84.56 KB of 12.64 MB Progress: 1% - Saving 169.56 KB of 12.64 MB Progress: 1% - Saving 254.

Hugo error - WARN 2020/01/28 15:49:09 found no layout file for HTML for section: You should create a template file which matches Hugo Layouts Lookup Rules for this combination.
item.description: C:\matt\website\public >hugo --theme cupper server Error: module "cupper" not found; either add it as a Hugo Module or store it in "C:\\matt\\website\\public\\themes".: module does not exist C:\matt\website\public >cd .. C:\matt\website >hugo --theme cupper server Building sites ï¿½ WARN 2020/01/28 15:49:09 found no layout file for "HTML" for "page": You should create a template file which matches Hugo Layouts Lookup Rules for this combination. WARN 2020/01/28 15:49:09 found no layout file for "HTML" for "section": You should create a template file which matches Hugo Layouts Lookup Rules for this combination.
